scripts.build-all: yarn run build-ui && yarn run build-css
scripts.setup: npm i && cd css && npm i
scripts.clean: rm -rf output .spago node_modules && cd css && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.watch-ui: yarn run spago bundle-app -w --then 'yarn run build-css' -p "ui-guide/**/*.purs" --to dist/example.js
